hotels.title: Stylish Sendai City Break Moments From JR Sendai Station
hotels.description: In the heart of a city filled with ruined castles, flawless gardens and nostalgic lamp-lit laneways, ANA Holiday Inn Sendai, an IHG Hotel offers guests the perfect base to discover the vibrant Miyagi Prefecture, just a six-minute walk from JR Central Sendai Station. After days spent exploring Sendai’s vibrant culinary scene and nearby Matushima - one of Japan’s three great scenic spots - retreat to Casual Dining Chef’s Table for traditional cuisine and sensational views of the Sendai skyline.
